ygData.subject: Re: New Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, fairly new smith here, skill of 22, I m a Troll Shadowknight. I had a pretty easy time plowing through metal bits to go from zero to 22, but now I m stuck,
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, fairly new smith here, skill of 22, I'm a Troll Shadowknight.

I had a pretty easy time plowing through metal bits to go from zero to 22,
but
now I'm stuck, since I can't find scaler/skewer molds anywhere (that I can
get
into anyhow). I'm fairly sure there is somewhere in Neriak to get them, but
for the life of me I couldn't find them, part of the reason is probably that
I got
tired of ducking through every door in that tiny little town. I almost have
my
faction fixed in Highhold such that I could look there as well, but not
quite.

So, any help on where to find scaler/skewer molds in Neriak/Oggok/Grobb,
and as for lanterns, they seem about as complicated to make as containers
are... I found a great supply of the parts for containers, but buying 3
parts per
container, putting them in the forge, adding a bit and a flask, then if I
succeed
I lose an inventory slot, just seems way too tedious. If i can find
scaler/skewers,
at least it's only 3 parts to combine that way, plus they fit in containers.

Any help would be appreciated.

Wauke - 20th TSK on EM
